page.title: 13HOME LIFE OF RACHEL WOULD
page.content: Home life of Rachel Would. Hello, I'm called Rachel Would.I have a very enjoyable day. First of all I get dressed and eat my breakfast of cornflakes and toast. Next I put my coat on and go to school. At school there is sometimes Assembly. At Assembly we sing hymns and Praise God. During the morning we sometimes watch Televison, do English or Maths. We also do a piece of work were you write stories.I love doing that.When we have finished we go home for dinner or stay at school.Every Thursday we have P.E.,and we go to the next school at Aldbrough.After P.E. we do Singing Together from the radio.Then we all go home from shool at half past three.
